short_desc: Pet adoption center cares for rescued cats and dogs and facilitates their adoption
description: Must be 18 years of age or older (25 or older for pit bulls*)   All animals receive veterinary and behavioral evaluations, spay or neuter surgery, vaccinations, microchip, heartworm testing (dogs over 6 months), FeLV/FIV testing (cats), heartworm preventative, flea and tick preventative and de-worming.Adoption package includes adoption counseling and follow-up calls, a take-home adoption packet, 6 weeks of BEBHS training classes (puppies and adult dogs, excludes senior dogs), temporary collar and ID tag, temporary leash or carrier, and a certificate for a free examination at a local veterinary hospital.
